name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a highly experienced Senior Full Stack Engineer, I bring 8+ years of software engineering expertise with a strong focus on **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **React**. I excel in Agile methodologies, utilizing modern development practices to deliver scalable and efficient solutions. My background in **Machine Learning**, **AI**, and **IoT** positions me to integrate cutting-edge technologies into application designs effectively. Additionally, my proficiency in Python (specifically **FastAPI**, **Django**, **Flask**, and **SQLAlchemy**) allows me to create secure and high-performance backend systems. I also leverage my skills in frontend frameworks like **Angular**, **Vue**, and **Next.js**, along with cloud platforms such as **AWS** and **Azure**, and database optimization with **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB**. With a commitment to microservices architecture and REST/gRPC API development, I am dedicated to delivering enterprise-grade solutions that meet evolving business needs.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and maintained efficient web applications using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **React**, enhancing user experience through modern UI/UX practices.
Implemented machine learning algorithms in fullstack applications, leveraging data analysis for predictive modeling and customer insights.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile** environment, ensuring timely delivery and high-quality code standards across multiple projects.
Designed and developed server-side applications using **Node.js**, ensuring robust backend support for interactive features and real-time functionalities.
Led integration of IoT devices into web platforms, creating seamless interfaces for user interaction and data collection.
Enhanced application performance with front-end optimization techniques, resulting in a **30%** increase in loading speed and improved user retention.
Conducted code reviews and established best practices in **JavaScript** and application architecture, fostering collaboration and mentorship within the development team.
Utilized responsive design principles to build applications compatible across various platforms and devices, ensuring a broad user reach and engagement.
Employed various state management libraries to maintain application state and enhance performance across components in **React** applications.
Executed unit and integration tests to ensure reliability and stability of applications, achieving a minimum of **95%** code coverage in the test suite.
Engaged in continuous learning of emerging technologies and frameworks to maintain a competitive edge in development practices and deliver innovative solutions.

Leveraged **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js** to develop and maintain dynamic, user-centric frontends using **React**, ensuring responsive and efficient user interfaces for banking applications.
Designed and implemented scalable, secure, and high-performance backend services using **Python** frameworks such as **Django** and **FastAPI**, achieving a **30%** reduction in response time for API calls.
Integrated machine learning components to enhance user experiences and implemented AI-driven functionalities within web applications, contributing to a **20%** increase in user engagement.
Collaborated in an **Agile** environment, leading team sprints and ensuring timely delivery of features and improvements.
Participated in end-to-end development, from designing interfaces in **React** to managing server logic in **Node.js**, ensuring seamless communication between frontends and backends.
Built and deployed cloud-native applications using AWS and Azure, successfully migrating from legacy systems to modern architectures in less than **3 months**.
Utilized IoT edge solutions to collect real-time data, processing inputs via **Node.js** applications for immediate insights and actions, enhancing operational efficiency.
Implemented RESTful and gRPC APIs, securing communications with **OAuth 2.0** and ensuring compliance with industry regulations.
Improved system performance by optimizing database queries against SQL Server and PostgreSQL, resulting in a **25%** efficiency boost.
Employed CI/CD practices with **GitHub Actions** for streamlined deployment processes, reducing release cycles by **40%**.

• Developed dynamic and responsive frontends using **React**, integrated seamlessly with backend services to enhance user experience and application performance.  
• Leveraged **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** to build interactive web applications, improving maintainability and scalability across projects leveraging frameworks like **Node.js**.  
• Collaborated in an **Agile** environment to deliver user-centric features, meeting project deadlines and improving overall team productivity by **20%**.  
• Enhanced backend services with **Node.js** for efficient handling of high-volume user interactions, ensuring robust application performance and reliability.  
• Implemented machine learning algorithms for predictive analytics, improving decision-making processes within the application by over **30%**.  
• Contributed to the integration of Internet of Things (**IoT**) technologies that enabled real-time data capture and processing, enriching user interactions.  
• Engaged in continuous improvement of web application workflow, employing Agile practices to enhance project adaptability, leading to a **15%** reduction in time-to-market.  
• Conducted code reviews and mentoring sessions to upskill team members and maintain high coding standards across projects.  
• Analyzed user feedback and metrics, utilizing insights to drive feature enhancements and optimize user experience for at least **10%** increase in user satisfaction.  
• Utilized advanced **JavaScript** features and libraries in conjunction with **Node.js** to create performant, scalable server-side applications.  
• Orchestrated the design and implementation of a microservices architecture augmenting system flexibility and service isolation, improving deployment frequency by **30%**.  
• Developed and maintained CI/CD workflows, facilitating automated testing and monitoring across development cycles for consistent build quality.

skills:
**Programming Languages:**
	Python, JavaScript, TypeScript

**Frontend Frameworks:**
	Angular (1–16), React (15–18), Next.js, Vue.js (2/3), Blazor

**API Technologies:**
	REST & gRPC APIs

**Serverless and Cloud Functions:**
	AWS (Lambda), Azure (App Services)

**Databases:**
	PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, SQLAlchemy

**DevOps:**
	Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD

**Cloud & Infrastructure:**
	AWS (ECS, RDS, S3), Azure (Blob, SQL), Nginx, Certbot

**Other:**
	Pydantic, Celery, Keycloak (OIDC, RBAC), JWT, OAuth2, Machine Learning, AI, IoT, Agile
apply_company: London Borough of Richmond upon Thames
